channel.title: How to change character starting items?
channel.description: Hey guys i figured out hwo to change the starting equipment, the armor and stuff, but every time someone new comes, i have to give them the cash, and the other stuff. But i want it so right when u make a new guy u automatically get teh stuff so i don't need to do that. Does anyone know? or is there a tutorial? Proud owner of MinimiScape[br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2006, 10:41:39 PM[/size][hr]plz doesn't anyone know??

item.title: How to change character starting items?
item.dc:creator: @Minimi_Guard Minimi Guard
item.description:
@Minimi_Guard wrote:

Thx man, you’re awesome!, let me try it…[br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2006, 06:31:18 AM[/size][hr]Wait, i ment, like not the weapons, i mean like when you make a new guy, he already has the armor which is what i did. But then, i mean, u start a new guy, and you get teh cash in the inventory, know what i mean? like regular items, but in your inventory

Read full topic
item.source: How to change character starting items?

item.title: How to change character starting items?
item.dc:creator: @svenimen_s Melissa T
item.description:
@svenimen_s wrote:

Ok ill do it for u 1 sec
[br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2006, 11:03:09 PM[/size][hr]Purpose: Give player other starters look

Difficulty: 1/10

Assumed Knowledge: To change codes

Server Base: Pimpscape

Classes Modified: player.java

Procedure

Step 1 :

Search for :

		//Giving the player an unique look

U will see this :

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=2643; playerEquipment[playerCape]=1052; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1712; playerEquipment[playerChest]=1127; playerEquipment[playerShield]=3840; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=1079; playerEquipment[playerHands]=6629; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=6619; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4718;

U see this ? :

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=[b]2643[/b]; The 2643 is the code for hat change that code to what hat ure want and that is the same whit all other…

Save,compile,run

Read full topic
item.source: How to change character starting items?
